member.summary: Handles the KeyPress event of the textBox control. Checks if the user has entered a number.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Client.Spearman_Form.SecondOk_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Click event of the OK button on a second window. Sends entered data to the server and receiving a response, displays it in the window.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.
